mapper.sql: GOOD_ID, PK_SOBOOKS, USER_ID, GOODTYPE_ID, GOODCODE, GOODNAME, BARCODE, SIMPLENAME, SUBGZ_ID, GOODSPECIF, CUNIT_ID, GOODTYPECODE, FZUNIT_ID, YICODE, UNITPROP, SUPPLIER_ID, NOTE, LASTPPRICE, CPRICE, RPRICE, LFZUPPRICE, FZUCPRICE, MPRICE, STOCKNUM, STOCKUPNUM, STOCKDOWNNUM
mapper.select:
select GOODNAME, GOODCODE, STOCKNUM, STOCKDOWNNUM from
where 1=1 and PK_SOBOOKS = #{PK_SOBOOKS} and IFNULL(dr,0)=0 and STOCKDOWNNUM > STOCKNUM

select a.GOODTYPE_ID, a.GOODCODE, a.GOODNAME, a.GOODPIC, a.GOODSPECIF, a.FZUNIT_ID, a.CPRICE, a.BARCODE, a.RPRICE, a.CUNIT_ID, a.STOCKNUM, a.FZUNIT_ID, a.UNITPROP, a.PK_SOBOOKS, b.TYPENAME, c.NAME as CUNIT, d.NAME as FZUNIT from base_good as a left join base_goodtype as b on a.GOODTYPE_ID =b.GOODTYPE_ID left join cp_spunit as c on c.SPUNIT_ID=a.CUNIT_ID left join cp_spunit as d on d.SPUNIT_ID=a.FZUNIT_ID where b.TYPENAME=#{TYPENAME} and a.PK_SOBOOKS = #{PK_SOBOOKS} and IFNULL(a.dr,0)=0 limit #{pageNum},10

select count(*) as TOTALNUM
from base_good as a left join base_goodtype as b on a.GOODTYPE_ID =b.GOODTYPE_ID left join cp_spunit as c on c.SPUNIT_ID=a.CUNIT_ID left join cp_spunit as d on d.SPUNIT_ID=a.FZUNIT_ID where b.TYPENAME=#{TYPENAME} and a.PK_SOBOOKS = #{PK_SOBOOKS} and IFNULL(a.dr,0)=0

select a.GOODTYPE_ID, a.GOODCODE, a.GOODNAME, a.GOODPIC, a.GOODSPECIF, a.FZUNIT_ID, a.CPRICE, a.RPRICE, a.CUNIT_ID, a.BARCODE, a.STOCKNUM, a.FZUNIT_ID, a.UNITPROP, a.PK_SOBOOKS, b.TYPENAME, c.NAME as CUNIT, d.NAME as FZUNIT from base_good as a left join base_goodtype as b on a.GOODTYPE_ID=b.GOODTYPE_ID left join cp_spunit as c on c.SPUNIT_ID=a.CUNIT_ID left join cp_spunit as d on d.SPUNIT_ID=a.FZUNIT_ID where a.GOODNAME like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') or b.TYPENAME like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') and a.PK_SOBOOKS = #{PK_SOBOOKS} and IFNULL(a.dr,0)=0 limit #{pageNum},10

select count(*) as TOTALNUM from base_good as a left join base_goodtype as b on a.GOODTYPE_ID=b.GOODTYPE_ID left join cp_spunit as c on c.SPUNIT_ID=a.CUNIT_ID left join cp_spunit as d on d.SPUNIT_ID=a.FZUNIT_ID where a.GOODNAME like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') or b.TYPENAME like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') and a.PK_SOBOOKS = #{PK_SOBOOKS} and IFNULL(a.dr,0)=0

select a.GOODTYPE_ID, a.GOODCODE, a.GOODNAME, a.GOODPIC, a.GOODSPECIF, a.FZUNIT_ID, a.CPRICE, a.RPRICE, a.CUNIT_ID, a.BARCODE, a.STOCKNUM, a.FZUNIT_ID, a.UNITPROP, a.PK_SOBOOKS, b.TYPENAME, c.NAME as CUNIT, d.NAME as FZUNIT from base_good as a left join base_goodtype as b on a.GOODTYPE_ID=b.GOODTYPE_ID left join cp_spunit as c on c.SPUNIT_ID=a.CUNIT_ID left join cp_spunit as d on d.SPUNIT_ID=a.FZUNIT_ID where a.PK_SOBOOKS = #{PK_SOBOOKS} and IFNULL(a.dr,0)=0 limit #{pageNum},10

select count(*) as TOTALNUM from base_good as a left join base_goodtype as b on a.GOODTYPE_ID=b.GOODTYPE_ID left join cp_spunit as c on c.SPUNIT_ID=a.CUNIT_ID left join cp_spunit as d on d.SPUNIT_ID=a.FZUNIT_ID where a.PK_SOBOOKS = #{PK_SOBOOKS} and IFNULL(a.dr,0)=0
